text: The flag of Asunción () has three horizontal stripes of red, white and red with the coat of arms of Asunción city conceived by the emperor Carlos V in 1539. It was adopted 4 may 2021. ==Related pages== * Asunción * Flag of Paraguay ==References== == Other websites == Asunción Category:Asunción Category:Flags with Spanish fess design Category:Flags with coats of arms Category:Bicolour flags
title: Flag of Asunción
